select DATE_FORMAT(dds.PUBLISH_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') PUBLISH_TIME,dds.*,du.USER_NAME,du.NICK_NAME,t.THEME_NAME from dxs_dynamic_state dds left join dxs_user du on dds.USER_ID = du.USER_ID left join dxs_theme t on dds.THEME_ID = t.THEME_ID where dds.DEL_FLG = '1' AND dds.CHECK_STATUS = 'SUCCESS'
AND dds.DYNAMIC_ID = #dynamicId#
AND du.USER_ID = #userid#
AND du.NICK_NAME like '%$nickname$%'

AND dds.TYPE = #type#
AND dds.STICK_FLG = #stickflg#
AND DATE_FORMAT(dds.PUBLISH_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') > DATE_FORMAT(#starpdate#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND DATE_FORMAT(dds.PUBLISH_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') < DATE_FORMAT(#enddate#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
order by dds.PUBLISH_TIME desc LIMIT $offset$, $limit$
